column1: Impeachment. A misguided Coronavirus Committee. Now the 25th Amendment.   Democrats apparently have the time to come up with baseless pursuits that are devoid of logic.  But they don’t have time to work with Republicans to protect the American people.  No surprise at all...

Democrats claim they’re fighting for American families and small businesses but what did they just do?  They BLOCKED a coronavirus relief bill that would help the very same people they claim to fight for.  They only care about posturing. What an absolute disgrace.

At such a pivotal moment for our country it’s imperative that we identify areas where we can cut bureaucratic red tape that hampers recovery from COVID-19.  Read my joint statement with @RepJamesComer ⬇️  https://t.co/q6FrHjDJeo

The @WhiteHouse and President @realDonaldTrump are leading the fight against COVID-19. Thanks to his leadership and the tireless work being done under Operation Warp Speed progress continues to be made on all fronts. https://t.co/9hgCPpozed

It was a pleasure meeting with HHS Deputy Secretary Hargan this afternoon at Wake Forest Baptist Health to talk about the COVID-19 response efforts & assistance through the CARES Act. https://t.co/Clleu61eeK

Through Operation Warp Speed - spearheaded by @realDonaldTrump and the Administration - the development manufacturing and distribution of COVID-19 vaccines will be put in the express lane.  With the help of this new public-private partnership meaningful progress will continue!
Speaker Pelosi’s ‘bipartisanship be damned’ approach is outright dangerous. Partisan theatrics will not protect our country from COVID-19.   👇 My statement on H.R. 6800 👇  https://t.co/56WoXgUvVN

The @WhiteHouse and @POTUS continue to lead the fight against COVID-19 in North Carolina.   39 health centers across N.C. are receiving close to $13M in funding for COVID-19 testing and testing-related activities!  👇More Below👇 https://t.co/TzAv0CLGql

Our comeback story is about Americans rising to the occasion. We will continue to move forward and we won't stop until COVID-19 is eradicated. Thank you @realDonaldTrump for leading the charge against this virus. America is not - and will never be - down for the count! https://t.co/AsSAWqzGR4

Congratulations to Marrianna Flores of Kernersville who was named a State Champion for Poetry Out Loud. Though the national finals were cancelled due to COVID-19 we can all celebrate the achievements of these exemplary students across the country. @NEArts #POL2020
Joining my colleagues on the Education & Labor Committee this afternoon to discuss how our constituencies are stepping up to combat COVID-19. https://t.co/6rhQx1mQSx

Businesses in North Carolina's 5th District are doing their part to defeat COVID-19. Indera Mills a company with 106 years of history in NC produces more than 20000 masks per day and is delivering them across all 50 states. Keep it up!  https://t.co/BfnVqxL9bL?

We’re no strangers to comeback stories. America’s economic engine is not down for the count. Everyday Americans are stepping up. The private sector is helping lead the charge. Americans helping Americans. Neighbors helping neighbors. We will defeat COVID-19 together.

The power of American ingenuity in action! Efforts by our federal agencies coupled with unleashing the power of the private sector continues to deliver for the American people. We will defeat the scourge of COVID-19 because at the end of the day we are all #InItTogether https://t.co/UgNJz5mnsV

Not surprising that POLITICO skews the narrative and equates COVID-19 deaths to the 2020 election. The media’s name shame and defame campaign against @realDonaldTrump is repulsive. This is a new low. https://t.co/T3LkoAnK3R

Will the creation of a select committee on COVID-19 really ensure effective oversight or is it another ‘Tremendous Opportunity to Restructure Things to Fit Our Vision’ like Whip Clyburn openly admitted? Here’s a hint: It’s the latter. https://t.co/13CwjjXujc

Another step in the fight against COVID-19. Thank you @LabCorp for spearheading the production of this crucial diagnostic test that will help protect and inform the American people! https://t.co/2NIqt2l622

These numbers come from the same officials that have relentlessly churned out misinformation to downplay COVID-19. Sadly this is just another example of the media buying into their narrative. China’s government must be held accountable! https://t.co/cdKjNNDc05

In times of crisis bad actors will always attempt to capitalize on fear and uncertainty. Thankfully resources like the Coronavirus Rumor Control webpage by @FEMA set the record straight and offer insightful guidance to the public.  https://t.co/WYnSRg0Wzu

I've compiled an extensive list of resources on my website that detail the provisions that are included in the COVID-19 legislation passed by Congress. My website is regularly updated so that you can access the latest available information. https://t.co/aQtvuKPO4j
Important update on the loan program for small businesses disrupted by COVID-19: https://t.co/rwz2WOYNyb
Yesterday I joined David Jackson of the Boone Area Chamber of Commerce via video call to talk about the CARES Act and the impact that COVID-19 has had on small businesses.  https://t.co/PBtgCpnBqo

Companies continue to step up and offer a helping hand during the #COVID19 crisis. In my district @HanesBrands has shifted their t-shirt production to start making face masks. This is yet another example of American ingenuity and innovation that must be commended and celebrated!

To all the businesses who continue to reach out about providing medical supplies equipment and services to combat #COVID19 here's a helpful link from FEMA on how to help: https://t.co/3lCOV2URv7  #InItTogether

Speaking w/ the Kernersville News now on COVID-19 its impact on small businesses across the country and how Congress and the Administration are stepping up to combat this virus. We will continue to push forward on all fronts to protect the American people. https://t.co/N9ZBqoMmWv
Keep yourself and your loved ones safe with these important updates on emerging scams! #COVID19 https://t.co/q3MURviaUZ

Online misinformation on COVID-19 continues to run rampant. It’s paramount that we seek reliable sources of information such as https://t.co/mRdFDH0vRc https://t.co/lgKkBJG4xB and https://t.co/TbMfin5xos to stay abreast of factual updates. https://t.co/0GVTNfXsGg

When it comes to online information and claims on coronavirus we must remain diligent. Do extensive research and utilize sources of information that are known to be credible. Here's a helpful article on what new scams are emerging: https://t.co/PtjC7fLO8y
